metadata.title: CVE-2022-26336 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A shortcoming in the HMEF package of poi-scratchpad (Apache POI) allows anattacker to cause an Out of Memory exception. This package is used to readTNEF files (Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Exchange Server). If anapplication uses poi-scratchpad to parse TNEF files and the applicationallows untrusted users to supply them, then a carefully crafted file cancause an Out of Memory exception. This issue affects poi-scratchpad version5.2.0 and prior versions. Users are recommended to upgrade topoi-scratchpad 5.2.1.

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
